title: Citi El Salvador Brings You a Special Offer in February: A Month of Love and Friendship
summary: San Salvador, El Salvador - During the month of love and friendship, Citi will be celebrating with an exclusive offer for all Citi credit card holders. From February 10 - 14, Citi card holders will receive a 35 percent discount to any restaurant or florist in the country when paying with Citi credit cards.
tag-1: Citi El Salvador Brings You a Special Offer in February: A Month of Love and Friendship
tag-2: San Salvador, El Salvador – During the month of love and friendship, Citi will be celebrating with an exclusive offer for all Citi credit card holders. From February 10 - 14, Citi card holders will receive a 35 percent discount to any restaurant or florist in the country when paying with Citi credit cards.
tag-3: The only thing the clients need to do is register all purchases between February 10 - 17 by calling 2212-2000 or at www.citi.com.sv. to take advantage of this special offer. The discount will only apply to purchases made between February 10 and 14, and the maximum discount available will be $50.
tag-4: The offer is valid for all credit cards issued by Citi in El Salvador.
tag-5: "At Citi we reward the loyalty of our customers, and that's why we want to offer different deals to celebrate this month of love and friendship," said Marketing Manager Roberto Martinod of Citi El Salvador.
tag-6: For those people who do not have a Citi credit card and wish to request one or want further information about our offers, call 2212-2000 or go to www.citi.com.sv.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
